page.title: 02Wentworth Toyshop
page.content: There are only a few shops in {Wentworth.}The one I am going to tell you about is called the{toyshop}it is owned by a youngish lady.She lives in the shop with her mother.She has lived in{Wentworth}for about 25 years now and likes the village.The lady who nice.The lady who lives in the shop makes all the{toys}that she sells in the shop.She told me Kerry and Helen that lots of people came into the shop in her dinner hour and she had to leave her dinner to go cold.She makes all sorts of cartoon caracters.She has lots of orders for her{toys.}Before she owned the shop her mother owned it.It was a{sweet shop }and before that it was a{cobblers shop}that was owned by another tenent that we dont know the name of.There is a sign above the door that says{"Boots, Shoes, {Menders". }
